text: Upper Thomson MRT station (TE8) is a underground Mass Rapid Transit station on the Thomsonâ€“East Coast line in Bishan, Singapore. The station is located at the traffic junction of Upper Thomson Road, Soo Chow Garden Road, Bright Hill Drive and Jalan Keli. It provides MRT access to the nearby Thomson Plaza. ==History== This station was first announced on 29 August 2012. ==References== Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Upper Thomson MRT station
